caption: From the perspective of night vision goggles, the scene displays in red and green. Fighter jets are flying in the sky, and a pilot maneuvers a bomber to drop bombs. Soon, the time transitions from night to day. Two pilots are piloting an aircraft. The Parisian military is aiming anti-aircraft guns at the sky. One aircraft is shot down, and the pilot is forced to parachute out. One of the pilots lands in a zoo, surrounded by various wild animals. He falls into the water, and a caretaker pulls him out. A painter is seen painting the exterior walls with green paint. Another pilot parachutes down and lands next to the painter.
